title: Covid misconceptions and US deaths
description: Tim Harford talks to statistician Ola Rosling about his research into misconceptions about Covid-19.  And an update on the epidemic in the US.
itunes:subtitle: How many of us believe the myths about coronavirus?
itunes:summary: Tim Harford talks to statistician Ola Rosling about his research into misconceptions about Covid-19.  And an update on the epidemic in the US.
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
